item.title: Cognex launches In-Sight L38 3D Vision System
item.description: Cognex releases the In-Sight L38, combining AI and 3D vision to simplify and improve reliability in automated manufacturing inspections.

item.title: Teledyne FLIR introduces new high-speed swir camera
item.description: Teledyne launches the SCION family of high-speed VIS-SWIR cameras targeting semiconductor and hyperspectral imaging applications.

item.title: ZEISS Launches New Industrial CT System for Battery Inspection
item.description: ZEISS introduces a new industrial CT system tailored for EV battery inspection, enhancing non-destructive quality assurance.

item.title: Hexagon Partners With Nvidia to Transform Industrial Digital Twin Capabilities
item.description: Hexagon deepens collaboration with NVIDIA to integrate reality capture and AI-enabled digital twins for optimized industrial workflows.

item.title: AI-Enhanced Machine Vision Powers the Next Generation of EV Battery Quality Control
item.description: Atlas Copco launches 'Smart Verification with AI' using specialized machine-vision cameras and AI to validate EV battery integrity and safety in real-time.

item.title: How AI at the Edge is Reinventing Manufacturing Quality
item.description: Siemens leverages Arm-based edge AI platforms to embed intelligence directly into production environments, enabling real-time anomaly detection without cloud latency.

item.title: AI-Powered End-of-Line Inspection Redefines Quality Control
item.description: Danube Dynamics and Asp√∂ck Systems utilize IDS industrial cameras and AI to automate complex end-of-line inspections for vehicle multi-chamber lamps.
